page.title: 09THE PARISH HALL.
page.content: In{Clawton}there is a{Parish Hall which provides{activties}and clubs for all the{local}people.The clubs are { Monday:Old Time Music. Tuesday:Mens {skittles. Wednesday:The Young Farmers. {Thursday:ladies Skittles. The Parish {Hall}was built in 1957 and is still {in}use today.It is built of{stones and the floor is{wood,but}the{kitchen has a tiled floor.{The Parish Hall}has a cleaner. The{cleaner gets}the key from the{Post Office in}Clawton.At Christ- mas our school does a{Christmas Con- {cert in}the{Parish}Hall,people rec- commend it.Without the{Parish Hall}the people of{Clawton would }not have the {facilties for}leisure{activties and socal events that they enjoy at the present time.
